# WOFOST

Here is an example

Input data

```{r}
library(Rwofost)
w <- example_weather()
# radiation should be in kJ
w$srad <- w$srad * 1000
head(w)
```

Crop parameters
```{r}
crop <- wofost_crop('barley')
```

Soil parameters
```{r}
soil <- wofost_soil('ec1')
```


```{r}
contr <- wofost_control()
contr$modelstart <- as.Date("2012-02-06")
```

Run model
```{r}
d <- wofost(crop, w, soil, contr)
```

Inspect output
```{r}
head(d)
tail(d)
plot(d[,'step'], d[, 'LAI'])
```
